Timepicker

Create a timepicker which can easily be used with keyboards.

Usage

To apply the timepicker, just add the data-uk-timepicker attribute to an <input> element. The timepicker will automatically display the actual time and you can change it in hourly and quarter-hourly intervals by pressing the up or down button on the keyboard.

Example

Markup

<form class="uk-form">
    <input type="text" data-uk-timepicker>
</form>

Display meridian time

To display meridian time, just add the showMeridian option: data-uk-timepicker="{showMeridian:true}".

Example

Markup

<form class="uk-form">
    <input type="text" data-uk-timepicker="{showMeridian:true}">
</form>

Javascript options

This is an example of how to set options via attribute:

data-uk-timepicker="{minuteStep:5, showSeconds:true}"
Option Possible value Default Description
defaultTime string 'current' Default value on focus and empty input
minuteStep integer 15 Minutes interval
secondStep integer 15 Seconds interval
showSeconds boolean false Show seconds
showMeridian boolean false Show Meridian
